author: SteveL-MSFT
body:

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: The one failure on all 3 platforms are not related to this change.  The failure is being addressed by https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4958

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I will merge this PR given that the failure is a known issue and not related to this PR.

title: fix the rest of the files with CRLF to just LF
